title: Semantic Understanding of Scenes Through the ADE20K Dataset

tldr.text: This work presents a densely annotated dataset ADE20K, which spans diverse annotations of scenes, objects, parts of objects, and in some cases even parts of parts, and shows that the networks trained on this dataset are able to segment a wide variety of scenes and objects.
